aws::graph::propositions: Technology and Infrastructure Costs at Amazon
Technology and infrastructure costs include payroll for employees involved in research and development of products and services.
Technology and infrastructure costs include payroll for employees involved in development of new products and services.
Technology and infrastructure costs include payroll for employees involved in development of existing products and services.
Technology and infrastructure costs include payroll for employees involved in design of Amazon's online stores.
Technology and infrastructure costs include payroll for employees involved in maintenance of Amazon's online stores.
Technology and infrastructure costs include payroll for employees involved in curation of products in Amazon's online stores.
Technology and infrastructure costs include payroll for employees involved in display of products in Amazon's online stores.
Technology and infrastructure costs include payroll for employees involved in curation of services in Amazon's online stores.
Technology and infrastructure costs include payroll for employees involved in display of services in Amazon's online stores.
Infrastructure costs include servers necessary to support Amazon Web Services (AWS).
Infrastructure costs include servers necessary to support other Amazon businesses.
Infrastructure costs include networking equipment necessary to support Amazon Web Services (AWS).
Infrastructure costs include networking equipment necessary to support other Amazon businesses.
Infrastructure costs include data center related depreciation necessary to support Amazon Web Services (AWS).
Infrastructure costs include data center related depreciation necessary to support other Amazon businesses.
Infrastructure costs include data center related amortization necessary to support Amazon Web Services (AWS).
Infrastructure costs include data center related amortization necessary to support other Amazon businesses.
Infrastructure costs include rent necessary to support Amazon Web Services (AWS).
Infrastructure costs include rent necessary to support other Amazon businesses.
Infrastructure costs include utilities necessary to support Amazon Web Services (AWS).
Infrastructure costs include utilities necessary to support other Amazon businesses.
Technology and infrastructure costs reflect investments to offer a wide variety of products to customers.
Technology and infrastructure costs reflect investments to offer a wide variety of services to customers.
Technology and infrastructure costs include expenditures related to building innovative software.
Technology and infrastructure costs include expenditures related to deploying innovative software.
Technology and infrastructure costs include expenditures related to building efficient software.
Technology and infrastructure costs include expenditures related to deploying efficient software.
Technology and infrastructure costs include expenditures related to building electronic devices.
Technology and infrastructure costs include expenditures related to deploying electronic devices.
Technology and infrastructure costs include expenditures related to development of a satellite network for global broadband service.
Technology and infrastructure costs include expenditures related to development of autonomous vehicles for ride-hailing services.

/FORM 10-K/Part II/Item 7 - Managementâ€™s Discussion and Analysis of Financial Condition and Results of Operations/

text:
#### Technology and Infrastructure

Technology and infrastructure costs include payroll and related expenses for employees involved in the research and development of new and existing products and services, development, design, and maintenance of our stores, curation and display of products and services made available in our online stores, and infrastructure costs. Infrastructure costs include servers, networking equipment, and data center related depreciation and amortization, rent, utilities, and other expenses necessary to support AWS and other Amazon businesses. Collectively, these costs reflect the investments we make in order to offer a wide variety of products and services to our customers, including expenditures related to initiatives to build and deploy innovative and efficient software and electronic devices and the development of a satellite network for global broadband service and autonomous vehicles for ride-hailing services.
